Pre-Game Insights: Hitman Rohit Sharma is one away from being the first Indian to notch 50 ODI sixes in a calendar year.
Shubman Gill is expected to boss over his favourite opponents.
Virat Kohli vs Trent Boult is anticipated to be an entertaining modern cricket rivalry.
Miscellaneous Highlights: India is looking to win their first ODI World Cup game against New Zealand in 20 years.
The match is expected to be a high-scoring one.
The HCPA Stadium in Dharamsala is anticipated to be a scenic venue.
Others: India has a 70 percent win percentage while chasing in ODIs since 2022.
Rohit Sharma has been in hot form in the World Cup this year with 265 runs in four games under his belt.
